query:
SELECT 
  j.id as job_id,
  j.status,
  svr.id as report_id,
  svr.timeOnsite,
  svr.timeLeftSite,
  svr.totalTimeMs,
  svr.totalPauseMs,
  svr.workingTimeMs,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jobTimePauses WHERE jobId = j.id) as pause_count,
  (SELECT SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, pausedAt, resumedAt)) 
   FROM jobTimePauses 
   WHERE jobId = j.id AND resumedAt IS NOT NULL) as total_pause_seconds
FROM jobs j
LEFT JOIN siteVisitReports svr ON svr.jobId = j.id
WHERE j.id = 210004;
